content: After the war, Annette and Hanneman both accepted teaching positions at Fhirdiad's school of sorcery. There, while educating the next generation of mages, they made great strides in their research of Crests and magic. Working side by side, the pair-formerly teacher and student, now partners and colleagues-brought great progress to the world and prestige to their institution. It is said that the wait list for students to enroll in either of their classes was notoriously long.
